programme.desc: Time Travel: Could the ability to travel through time be real? Experts unseal new evidence suggesting this phenomenon of science fiction might not be as far-fetched as it seems. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The World on Alert: After decades of secrecy, high-ranking government officials are now discussing UFOs. But why now? Some say the evidence has become too great to ignore. (S14, ep 4)

programme.desc: Random Bear: Grizzy and the lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Interference: Grizzy has prepared himself a TV dinner, but his meal is interrupted by unexplained static. Grizzy finds that the true 'interference' is down to the lemmings. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: High Voltage Bear Attack: The lemmings are having a party, but when Grizzy throws their ghetto blaster into the river he sparks a power cut! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Scents: Grizzy decides to give she-bear the flowers that decorate the window ledges of the ranger's cabin. Can he bring them to her without the lemmings ruining them? (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Luck: After making a fool of himself in front of she-bear, Grizzy finds a four-leaf clover which seems to bring him good luck. Could his chance be changing? (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Magnetic Bear: Grizzy can't believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves, but it's the lemmings who are playing around. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Charm: Grizzy believes that the she-bear he's in love with has been turned into a frog. He looks through the ranger's book of fairytales, searching for a way to turn her back. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear's Best Friend: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon near the log cabin. When the lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in. (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Super Grizzy Bros: Grizzy discovers the joy of video games on the ranger's console. The lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his racing game. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Simply Perfect: When the kids are about to be subject to school testing with no time to study, Courtney freaks and orders a Brainiac Ray from the back of a comic book. (S2 Ep34)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Ghoul Spirit: Gwen rejects the friendship of a friendly ghost. (S2 Ep35)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Duncan Carving: Duncan takes advantage of a questionable Halloween legend to steal candy from his classmates. (S2 Ep36)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Baby Brother Blues: When Beth is told that the impending arrival of a baby brother is about to ruin her life, she runsaway to find a new family. (S2 Ep37)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Space Codyty: Izzy, convinced that Cody is an alien, embarks on a journey through space to take him back home. (S2 Ep38)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gobble Head: Chef accidentally cooks up a killer cyborg turkey in a failed attempt to get the kids to appreciate him on Appreciation Day. (S2 Ep39)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Snack To The Future: Owen wants his favourite treat, 'Jiggle Giggle', so bad that he's uses a time machine to get to snack time quicker. (S2 Ep40)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Me, My Elf, And I: Duncan tricks Chef into taking the class to the North Pole to remove his name from the naughty list. (S2 Ep41)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Fractions: The Lemmings find a crate from an army convoy transporting ultra-secret material that divides objects into multiple miniaturised versions of themselves. (S1 Ep52)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear that Laid Golden Eggs: Near the supermarket, a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket. (S1 Ep53)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Crash Training Course: Grizzy finds a gadget that enables you to learn anything. He can now become the perfect bear! But first, he needs to learn how to get rid of the Lemmings. (S1 Ep54)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: As Far as Bear Can Remember: An old metal box found by chance brings back childhood memories for Grizzy and the Lemmings. They recall the first time they met, when they were still kids. (S1 Ep55)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Chemical Lemmings: How can Grizzy watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box? (S1 Ep56)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Remote Control: Grizzy's TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. (S1 Ep57)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear and the Butterfly: Grizzy wants to offer a butterfly to the she-bear he's in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens he's spotted. (S1 Ep58)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Get Off My Tennis Shoes: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight! (S1 Ep59)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Babysitting: Grizzy babysits for the bear he has a crush on. There's no question of Grizzy tripping up, for he has no intention of taking any risks! (S1 Ep60)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Lock and Key: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the ranger's brand new and apparently burglar-proof safe. (S1 Ep61)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Blues: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. (S1 Ep62)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Snow Lemmings: Grizzy craves ice cream on a hot day, but the Lemmings have used strawberry-vanilla ice cream to create a sled run in the backyard. (S1 Ep63)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Reverser: A student named Marc gets akumatized into Reverser. Convinced that Marinette and Nathaniel made a fool of him, he seeks revenge. (S2 Ep21)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Malediktator: When Chloe threatens to leave Paris, Mr Bourgeois gets akumatized into Maledikator. Will Ladybug manage to stop him? (S2 Ep22)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: As You Squish: A town of seahorses mistake Squishella as their fabled hero, but rather than correcting them, she embraces the role. (S1 Ep110)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: The Race: Miss Primrose accelerates the students' training by sending them to an advanced obstacle course. But will competition get in the way? (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Catlantic City: Felicity brings Miguel to Catlantic City, where Miguel is locked up in the pound for being a dog. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Scaredy Cat: Felicity, Miguel, Yana and Athena have to cross Phobia Forest to cash in coupons for free cupcakes. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Dame-gerous Game: After Leshawna, Bridgette, Owen and Cody win a hide and seek contest, they're trapped on a private island by a jealous ex-champion and forced to play for their freedom. (S2 Ep14)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Royal Flush: When the other kids fear Harold has accidentally flushed himself down Chef's fancy new toilet, they travel into the sewer on a rescue mission. (S2 Ep15)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Eclipse Of The Fart: After accidentally swallowing her first loose tooth and fearing that means no cash under the pillow, Leshawna tries to capture the tooth fairy. (S2 Ep16)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: DJ Haskell's Dance Off: Beats drop in a hero and villain dance off. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: Sundae's Best: Luca is not impressed by Sundae's latest inventions... (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: Multiplying Minions: Sundae's multiplying device proves you really can be your own worst enemy. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: Cats Vs Dogs: Shasha and Heather sing to answer which is better. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: Beach Breakdown: Sundae and Kat's day off is ruined by Guardians. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: As You Squish: A town of seahorses mistake Squishella as their fabled hero, but rather than correcting them, she embraces the role. (S1 Ep110)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: The Broken Gem: The Sapphires try everything to prevent Sophia and Ava from fighting, but they've got bigger problems: two dastardly henchmen are after the grimstone. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Gone With The Wand: Felicity and friends find a magic wand, which they use to make crazy wishes until they can locate the wand's rightful owner. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Fountain Of Too Much Youth: When Miguel discovers his favourite malt is now on the kids menu, he drinks from the Fountain of Youth to get younger. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Oozing Talent: When Sugar unwittingly wins a job as spokesperson for a diarrhoea medication, she enlists the help of her friends to stop the commercial from premiering during the big game. (S3 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Senior Sinisters: Harold concocts an anti-age cream for Chef, but when it turns the kids old Chef decides to hide the reversal cream - taking care of old people is making him young again! (S3 Ep47)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Be Claws I Love You, Shelley: When Owen brings a lobster in for show and tell, we discover that Chef has a real lobster problem. (S3 Ep48)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Trauma Rama: Duncan, normally the bad kid, has an identity crisis when his pranks start curing people of their fears. (S3 Ep49)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Doomed Ballooned Marooned: After over-decorating a birthday table with balloons, several kids float away to a deserted island. (S3 Ep50)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Legends of the Paul: Duncan is jealous of Paul's 100-year time out and, determined to be King of the Pranks, has to team up with Paul, learn his ways and double-cross him to become a legend. (S3 Ep51)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Bridgette Too Far: As season three draws to a close, Bridgette becomes desperate to star in an episode. (S3 Ep52)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Robo Teacher: When a substitute teacher fills in for Chef, Duncan thinks it's going to be the best day ever. He's wrong. (S2 Ep1)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Glove Glove Me Do: Owen's newly found gloves make him great at everything. But this greatness comes at a high price. (S2 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Tooth About Zombies: Gwen's favourite event, the Zombie March, falls on the same day as Beth's nightmare event, dental check-up day. The two girls find a way to help each other out. (S2 Ep3)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Lie-ranosaurus Wrecked: Owen pretends to be Izzy's pet dinosaur after leading her to believe she dug him up in the school playground. (S2 Ep4)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: An Egg-stremely Bad Idea: Hoping to 'brighten her day,' Izzy and Owen revamp Gwen's egg chair. (S2 Ep5)

programme.desc: The Gold And The Stickerful: Courtney becomes infatuated with a new gold sticker incentive program that Chef introduces to the class. (S2 Ep43)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Power Players

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty

programme.title: Frail Women

programme.title: Rumpole of the Bailey

programme.title: My Man Godfrey

programme.title: The Small Voice

programme.title: The Brothers
